  • Constructor Details

    • ConnectionSocket

      public ConnectionSocket(ClientController controller, String address, int port) throws IOException
      Initialize the Socket connection to the server
      Parameters:
      controller - ClientController, on which it will call all the methods after the server request
      address - IP address of the server
      port - IP port of the server
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurred during connection

      Starts socket's connection, opening the socket and the streams.
      Specified by:
      startConnection in class ConnectionClient
      Throws:
      Exception - if something has gone wrong.

      insertCard in class ConnectionClient
      Parameters:

      chatToPlayer in class ConnectionClient
      Parameters:

      receiver - the client receiver of the message.

    • setPlayersNumber

      public void setPlayersNumber(int players, String gameName)
      Called when the client wants to set players' number.
      Specified by:
      setPlayersNumber in class ConnectionClient
      Parameters:
      players - is the number of players to be set.
      gameName - The name the player wants to save the game with

    • setSavedGame

      public void setSavedGame(boolean wantToSave, String gameName)
      Called after client's decision about saved games.
      Specified by:
      setSavedGame in class ConnectionClient
      Parameters:
      wantToSave - true if he wants to re-start from a saved game.
      gameName - the name of the game he wants to resume.

    • listen

      public void listen()
      The infinitive loop that always listens throws socket connection until an error occurs. This method notifies the client if the server has disconnected for some reason.
